message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  I'm confident you'll recognize its worth!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm afraid $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it, considering its value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, the product's unique features make it worth a premium. How about we meet halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product, considering its value to me.
